mapper.select: SELECT no,cno,rank,title,singer,album,poster,state,idcrement,num FROM (SELECT no,cno,rank,title,singer,album,poster,state,idcrement,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,cno,rank,title,singer,album,poster,state,idcrement FROM genie_music WHERE cno=#{cno} ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num between #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT no,rank,title,singer,album,poster,state,idcrement FROM genie_music WHERE cno != 1 AND REGEXP_LIKE (${column},#{fd},'i')
